title: sAri bandane
sahitya:
sAri bandane prANesha bandane


anupallavi

  sAri banda lankApurava mIrida rAvaNana kaNDu dhIranu vayyAradinda


caraNam 1    vAyu putrane shrI ramane dUtane prIyadinda sItAnganege mudrikeya tandittavane
    caraNam 2    bhImasEnane kuntI tanayane virATaNa maneyali nindu kIcakana samharisidane
    caraNam 3    madhva rAyane sarvajna shrEStane advaitava keddu purandara viTTalana munde nintane
